Why should you do it yourself when we do it for you?!

OwlyPotion makes your life easier

The art of potions is a subtle science and a delicate balance that need to be mastered to truly understand the beauty of the soflty simmering cauldron with its shimmering fumes (Severus Snape). Worst of all, if not properly mastered, it can be lethal.

With OwlyPotion, no need to master it nor to waste time. Order our certified potions online and get them deliver at your window by our owl shipping service. You can even get a subscription to your favorites and receive them as often as you like!

What's OwlyPotion?

42 partner shops in UK

2654 certified potions

4 types of delivery, including an extra fast by phoenix

On-call Potion Master and Healer

Bottles under unbreakable charm

A simple deposit system

How does it work?

Download our app and get registered. You have now access to all certified potions from our partner shops!Add potions to your favorites, order them online, get a subscription or pop in our shops.

Once your bottle is empty, send them back by our delivery owl or return them in our shops and get your desposit back. No risque of cluttered cupboards with that system, and youâ€™re always sure the bottles are properly cleaned.
